payload.description: Code and photography focused Jekyll blog backed by a Personal API.

commits.message: refactor: triangulation in masthead styles and avatars  (#145)

pull_request.title: refactor: triangulation in masthead styles and avatars
pull_request.body:
### ➺ Overview

> Version bump: `v0.12.2`

This PR is a design iteration focusing on the document masthead for both the home page and blog layout. It also adds a link to GitHub under the pinned repositories list and updates the avatar.

### ➺ Screenshots

| Name | Before | After |
|------|--------|-------|
| Blog Post | ![Screenshot: blog post (before)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1934719/65657785-c6570600-dfd9-11e9-95f9-c6bc6ff331f1.png) | ![Screenshot: blog post (after)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1934719/65657808-e25aa780-dfd9-11e9-8878-77df1287dff0.png) | Home Page |
| Home Page | ![Screenshot: home page (before)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1934719/65657914-5c8b2c00-dfda-11e9-9b1f-b4a7de04a352.png) | ![Screenshot: home page (after)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1934719/65657850-10d88280-dfda-11e9-9dbc-bfeff5eeb24c.png) |
